item.title: An owl in Academia
item.description: A night owl person is someone who tends to stay awake late at nights and feels more energetic post-evening. Have a look at this article on Wikipedia if you’re unaware of what being a night owl means: Night owl. Sleep early to wake up early. - Dad Sounds simple, right? You’ve got to attend school at 6am so sleep as early as 10pm the night before. Well it makes sense, but the point is I just can’t!

item.title: Test Content
item.description: why Don’t I just lorem them Ipsums? Many people do this, and it seems quite reasonable to put some Lorem ipsum at place as for test content to fill out blanks and show pros and cons of a design, right? I’m not sure about that! I just don’t like the idea of publishing something that is not but ctrl+c => ctrl+v, especially because I have somehow convinced myself to commit to not removing anything of this blog after publishing.

item.title: About this blog
item.description: If you intend to know more about me or get in touch with me, have a look at My Website I love writing, I mean I love being heard but I love writing regardless of weather my writing is being read or not. I love writing as if it were some sort of calming my unfamiliar-with-peace mind. This “personal” blog of mine is supposed to be a semi-safe place for me to write, of everything and without a clear goal to be aimed at.
